TechnoTypeClass *  pItem 
) [static] 

00100 {
00101         int BuildLimit = pItem->BuildLimit;
00102         if(BuildLimit >= 0) {
00103                 return BuildLimit > pHouse->CountOwnedNow(pItem);
00104         } else {
00105                 return abs(BuildLimit) > pHouse->CountOwnedEver(pItem);
00106         }

) [static]

00092                 if(Remaining <= 0 && IncludeQueued) {
00093                         return FactoryClass::FindThisOwnerAndProduct(pHouse, pItem) ? 1 : -1;
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         return Remaining > 0;
00097 }
